Package rekit.util

Class ReflectUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • rekit.util.ReflectUtils

  • public final class ReflectUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains several methods for using Java Reflections in a proper way.
    Author:
    Dominik Fuchss

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  ReflectUtils.LoadMe
      This annotation has to be applied to Classes which shall be loaded as implementation of a specific class and shall be instantiated.
      If a class wants to be loaded, the class needs a default constructor

      static <T> java.util.Set<T> loadInstances​(java.lang.String searchPath, java.lang.ClassLoader loader, java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Load all implementations that shall be loaded (see ReflectUtils.LoadMe) of a class by search path (-> classpath).

    • Method Detail

      • loadInstances

        public static <T> java.util.Set<T> loadInstances​(java.lang.String searchPath,
                                                 java.lang.ClassLoader loader,
                                                 java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Load all implementations that shall be loaded (see ReflectUtils.LoadMe) of a class by search path (-> classpath).
        If a class wants to be loaded, the class needs a default constructor
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class-type
        Parameters:
        searchPath - the search path (e.g. java.lang)
        loader - the class loader
        type - the class
        Returns:
        a set of instances of the found classes

      • getClasses

        public static <T> java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<? extends T>> getClasses​(java.lang.String searchPath,
                                                                         java.lang.ClassLoader loader,
                                                                         java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Get all implementations of a class by search path (-> classpath) .
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class-type
        Parameters:
        searchPath - the search path (e.g. java.lang)
        loader - the class loader
        type - the class
        Returns:
        a set of the found classes

      • getClassesAnnotated

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> getClassesAnnotated​(java.lang.String searchPath,
                                                                    java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotation)
        Get all classes which are annotated with ... by search path (-> classpath).
        No subtypes will be returned except if they are annotated too.
        Parameters:
        searchPath - the search path (e.g. java.lang)
        annotation - the class annotation
        Returns:
        a set of the found classes
